title: Hands-on Exercise 2
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
packages <- c('sf', 'tidyverse')
for(p in packages) {
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)) {
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}

title: In-class Exercise 2
description: In this hands-on exercise, I learnt how to handle geospatial data in R by using sf package

title: Welcome to IS415 Web Blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, IS415 Web Blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
